instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3332 no keyboard, then no backlight
threads.message: Hi I have this board which was liquid damaged by customer, first it didn´t turn on, then it turned on and had no trackpad or keyboard, now I changed U5701 / Q5701 / U5750 and have a working keyboard/trackpad but no backlight... I even have  PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT at 55v, but no backlight, just get the image in the back...

threads.title: 820-3332 no keyboard, then no backlight
threads.message:
55V on backlight output, means the LEDs strip connection is lost.
Bad LEDs strip, video cable, or LCD connector.
Try known good LCD assembly first.
